ing: 2 (15.5 ounce) cans French cut green beans
des: "This recipe uses canned French cut green beans, combined with fresh bacon, mushrooms, and garlic for a tasty side dish."
ins: Place bacon into a large saucepan over medium heat. Cook until browned, stirring occasionally. Add the mushrooms and garlic, and reduce the heat to medium-low. Let cook for a few minutes to soften the mushrooms. Stir in the green beans and soy sauce, and heat through.
